MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH45 area of Peebles, affecting properties in Rosetta Road and surrounding streets. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1pm due to locating a damaged underground cable at Kingsland Square and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 12:45 PM on Monday, 15 February 2021.
